dmca.title: FAKE, DO NOT PUBLISH
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Bajaj,

It has come to our attention that you have been downloading copyrighted movies using the BitTorrent protocol by Apple. This is a direct violation of Title 17 SS 501-505. Under the jurisdiction granted by us by your locale (South Carolina Federal), we have been able to obtain your email address and related info.

The following was the information we obtained:

Client: uTorrent 1770/Opera
IP: 99.38.228.55
Time: 5:57 P.M. May 5, 2008

Note that your IP address may have changed since the violation.

Under our exercised authority, we are notifying you via email and snail mail to immediately destroy all copies of iWork and related Apple products within the next 10 days. Please notify us of the destruction of all property with proof.

Regards,
Apple Legal Team
Ryan Vel
1-800-694-7466
Corporate Lawyer
